attributes.action: not allow Samantha Orobator, a pregnant British woman, to be executed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Samantha Orobator is accused of smuggling 680g of heroin into Laos. Under Laotian law, execution is mandatory for over 500g. Samantha is 20 years old, pregnant, British, and has not been allowed anywhere near a fair level of contact with a solicitor. Her trial has just been moved forward to next week, which gives any solicitor little chance to prepare a defense.
We ask the Prime Minister, quite simply, not to let the Laotians kill her (and, preferably, to secure her safe return to the UK).
